attributes.action: refer SKY (BSkyB) to the Monopolies Commission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Company abuses its market dominance by controlling access to the equipment required, the maintenance of their costing on that equipment, its supply and installation. 
The company should be forced to allow other companies to supply equivalent equipment

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
